categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Esdras was a male Sith Lord of the Sith Empire living during the Cold War. He was the master of Hiran Bessiker, whom in 3643 BBY Esdras sent to Balmorra to recover a Holocron unearthed by the Republic.
Esdras is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Sith Inquisitor class mission on Balmorra.
